use-lawful-reason: The agricultural building has been used for storage of farm equipment and feed for over 15 years as part of the working farm operation. The use falls outside the Use Classes Order as it constitutes agricultural use ancillary to the farming activities on the landholding. No planning permission was required as the use benefits from agricultural permitted development rights.

documents.name: Farm business registration with Rural Payments Agency

specified-use: Agricultural storage ancillary to farming operations
